actions.name: Early Bird
actions.description: Effect:The user's @Affliction[drowsy] Affliction ticks down one extra Stack per Activation. When the user loses the @Affliction[drowsy] Affliction, it may freely move 4m of a Movement speed of its choice.

system.description: Effect:The user's @Affliction[drowsy] Affliction ticks down one extra Stack per Activation. When the user loses the @Affliction[drowsy] Affliction, it may freely move 4m of a Movement speed of its choice.
